title: Capturing electronic patient reported outcomes in oncology practice. - ASCO Publications

summary.text: **KEY FINDING**: Integrating digital PROs reduced patient dropout by 40%, improving data quality.
**TACTICAL WIN [SHIP NOW]**: Use automated reminders to increase completion rates in oncology trials.
**MARKET SIGNAL [ðŸŸ¡ NOTABLE]**: Growing emphasis on PROs for personalized treatment decisions.
**CONCERN**: Ensuring cross-device compatibility remains a challenge for seamless data collection.
